 (MBF KV 2) Calling to get Vision 1. Eligibility : Loại thuê bao Applicable regulation Prepaid : in curring cost at HCM city . The incurred cost : MUST be deducted from main balance. If being deducted from other credits (bonus credit...) will not be counted Postpaid: having Billing address at HCM city The costs that are converted into lucky code will not include monthly fee, but include monthly promotions (such as VNPT, birthday, loyalty, payment offers, discounting) Notice - In case using M2U service, apply for transferor only. - Not applicable for: Professional, assigned, tested subscribers and internal customer’s subscriber 2. Content: Every VNd 3 0.000 / day incurs, you will get 01 lucky code . If the incurred cost cannot be evenly divided by 30.000 , if the left amount of money >= VND 15.000 (Greater than or equal to VND 15000), customer will get 01 code. If Time to get lucky codes when incurring cost is day by day (from 0:00 to 23:59 of that day) On date N, the system will automatically give code to eligible subscriber of N-2 date Unlucky codes of current round can continue being drawn for next round. Postpaid can join lucky draw for winning IPAD mini 3. Prizes and drawing time a. Prizes Prizes Value (VND) Number of Prize/week Number of Prize of program First Prize ( Honda vision 2013) 28.700.000 1 7 Second Prize ( Nokia Lumia 620) 5 .0 00.000 2 14 Third Prize ( VND 500.000 Top-up card ) 500.000 6 42 Speacial Prize for Postpaid ( IPAD mini 64GB/ with Sim PFC which has VND 50.000đon main balance) 3G/ Wifi 19.000.000 2 b. The lucky draw time: Every week, center 2 will VMS will hold Lucky Draw Ceremony with Codes that have been sent on that week and are unlucky codes of previous week ( except for Round 8: will draw with all codes that have been sent from the beginning) Round The lucky draw time Applied for Lucky codes which are sent to customer From To 1 24.10.2013 16.10.2013 20.10.2013 2 31.10.2013 21.10.2013 27.10.2013 3 07.11.2013 28.10.2013 03.11.2013 4 14.11.2013 04.11.2013 10.11.2013 5 21.11.2013 11.11.2013 17.11.2013 6 28.12.2013 18.11.2013 24.11.2013 7 04.12.2013 25.11.2013 26.11.2013 8 04.12.2013 (Applicable for postpaid) 16.10.2013 26.11.2013 4 . Procedure to determine the winner : The winners are ones who have lucky codes which are the same with codes that are determined in the Lucky Draw Ceremony Every week, center 2 will VMS will hold Lucky Draw Ceremony with Codes that have been sent on that week and unlucky codes of previous week. MF will find out the official winning codes and back up winning codes. At the same time, MF will make a report of the Lucky draw and verify information of winners. If subscriber has lucky code but not eligible to get prizes, MF will continue verifying back up codes with priority The winners are ones who have lucky codes must active 2 ways communication and not be in debt at the time drawing and awarding One subscriber can get many codes to join promotion. During the promotion time, subscriber will receive prizes as much as they win. Base on the result of luck draw that is hold every week, MF will contact the winner to verify information and brief customer how to update accurate information After verifying information, center 2 will promulgate list of winner and make announcement to Branches and Winners about procedure, time and place for receiving prizes 5 . Places and Procedure of receiving Prize a. Condition : The first prize will be received by cash as the exchange value of Honda Vision (2013 version) that is announced on Oct 2nd, 2013 by Honda Vietnam (VND 28.700.000). The second prize will be received in kind (Nokia Lumia 620). The third prize will be received in kind (VND 500.000 top up card). As for special prize for postpaid will be received in kind ( IPAD mini 64GB/ with Sim PFC which has VND 50.000đon main balance; 3G/ Wifi ) All prizes can not be exchanged for any other forms. The Winners shall be responsible for all costs in connections with collecting his/her prize The winner can receive prize only when he/she can present ID Card which has information such as full name, date of birth, ID number as same as on MF system. To enterprise subscribers, when receiving prize must bring Letter of Introduction of the same company , Business License of Winning Company and receiver’s ID card The winner must have subscriber that have p ersonal information as same as information they has registered on the MF system and via confirmation from operator At the time of giving the prize, MF just gives prize to whose personal information are the same with information that customer has registered on the MF system. In case, the subscriber owner cannot receive prize, he/she can authorize others, who must b ring letter of attorney which must be certified by government agencies, to receive prizes Changing tariff plan ( between prepaid plans, from pre paid to post paid pr post paid to pre paid) can receive prize The winners are not allowed to transfer ownership from the time lucky draw ceremony is hold to the time receiving prize, except for cases that are allowed by MF b. Awarding time and place: &#183; First, second and special prize for Postpaid" Center 2 will give the prize directly to winners . MF representative will hold Award ceremony that will be graced by the presence of representative of Ministry of Industry and Trade, Press and CEO of Center 2 &#183; Third prize : awarding at Mobifone store. &#183; Awarding time : after ending this program and be expected in late 12/2013 6. MF&#31995;&#32479;&#19978;&#25152;&#27880;&#20876;&#30340;&#20449;&#24687;&#30456;&#21516;&#12290;&#23545;&#20110;&#21333;&#20301;&#12289;&#20844;&#21496;&#12289; &#20225;&#19994;&#21495;&#30721;&#23458;&#25143;&#38656;&#20986;&#31034;&#21333;&#20301;&#20171;&#32461;&#20070;&#12289;&#33829;&#19994;&#35768;&#21487;&#35777;&#12289;&#39046;&#22870;&#20154;&#36523;&#20221;&#35777; IPAD mini &#12434;&#21463;&#12369;&#20184;&#12369;&#12427;&#12481;&#12515;&#12531;&#12473;&#12398;&#12503;&#12525;&#12464;&#12521;&#12512;&#12395;&#21442;&#21152;&#12391;&#12365;&#12427;&#12290; 3. &#36062;&#21697;&#12392;&#25277;&#36984;&#12371;&#12392;&#65306; a. &#36062;&#21697;&#65306; &#20301; &#20385;&#20516;&#65288;&#12505;&#12488;&#12490;&#12512;&#12489;&#12531;&#65289; &#36062;&#21697;&#25968; / &#36913;&#38291; &#12503;&#12525;&#12464;&#12521;&#12512;&#12398;&#36062;&#21697;&#25968; &#31532;&#19968;&#20301; Honda vision &#12496;&#12452;&#12463; 2870 &#19975; 1 &#21517;&#27096; 7 &#21517; &#27096; &#31532;&#20108;&#20301; Nokia Lumia 620 &#25658;&#24111;&#38651;&#35441; 500 &#19975; &#48977;&#55180; &#52628;&#52392;&#48264;&#54840;&#50752; &#46041;&#51068;&#54624; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#50948; &#52628;&#52392;&#48264;&#54840;&#44032; &#51080;&#45716; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#44032; &#47928;&#49436;&#47484; &#51089;&#49457;&#54616;&#50668; &#45817;&#52392;&#46112; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51032; &#51221;&#48372;&#47484; &#54869;&#51064;&#51012; &#49892;&#54665;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796;. &#45817;&#52392;&#46112; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51008; &#51312;&#44148;&#51012; &#51025;&#45813;&#54624; &#49688; &#50630;&#51012; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#50864;&#49440; &#49692;&#50948;&#47196; &#44228;&#49549; &#50696;&#51221;&#45817;&#52392;&#48264;&#54840;&#47484; &#54869;&#51064;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796;. &#52628;&#52392;&#48264;&#54840;&#44032; &#51080;&#45716; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#44032; &#52628;&#52392;&#54665;&#49324;&#49884;&#44036;&#44284; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#54620;&#45796; . &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45817; &#50668;&#47084; &#52628;&#52392;&#48264;&#54840;&#44032; &#51080;&#45796; . &#50668;&#47084; &#52628;&#52392;&#48264;&#54840;&#50640; &#45817;&#52392;&#46104;&#47732; &#44536;&#47564;&#53372; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . &#47588;&#50864;&#51032; &#45817;&#52392;&#46112; &#47749;&#45800;&#50640; &#44540;&#44144;&#54616;&#50668; &#47784;&#48708;&#54256;&#51008; &#45817;&#52392;&#46112; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50752; &#50672;&#46973;&#54644;&#49436; &#51221;&#48372;&#47484; &#54869;&#51064;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#47728; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51008; &#51221;&#54869;&#54624; &#51221;&#48372;&#47484; &#50629;&#45936;&#51060;&#53944;&#47484; &#50504;&#45824;&#54644;&#46300;&#47532;&#44192;&#45796; . &#54869;&#51064;&#54624; &#51208;&#52264;&#47484; &#50756;&#47308;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#49468;&#53552; 2 &#45716; &#45817;&#52392;&#46112; &#47749;&#45800;&#51012; &#48156;&#54364;&#54644;&#49436; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#51208;&#52264; , &#49884;&#44036; &#48143; &#51109;&#49548;&#50640; &#44288;&#54616;&#50668; &#45824;&#47548;&#51216;&#51060;&#45208; &#51648;&#51216;&#44284; &#45817;&#52392;&#46112; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; &#53685;&#48372;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . 5. &#51208;&#52264; &#48143; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#51109;&#49548; : a. &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#51312;&#44148;: &#51068;&#46321;&#51008; 2013 &#45380;&#50640; &#49373;&#49373;&#46108; Honda Vision &#51032; &#44032;&#52824;&#50752; &#46041;&#46321;&#54624; &#54788;&#44552;&#51004;&#47196; &#48155;&#51012; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . Honda Viet Nam &#44032; 2013 &#45380; 10 &#50900; 02 &#51068;&#50640; &#44277;&#54252;&#54620; &#44032;&#52824;&#45716; 28.700.000 &#46041;&#51064;&#45796; . &#51068;&#46321;&#51008; &#45432;&#53412;&#50500; &#47336;&#48120;&#45208; 620 &#55092;&#45824;&#54256;&#51004;&#47196; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#49688;&#50668;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . &#49340;&#46321;&#51008; &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300; 500.000 &#46041;&#51676;&#47532;&#47196; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#49688;&#50668;&#54624; &#44163; &#51060;&#45796;. &#54980; &#48520;&#51228;&#47564;&#51032; &#44221;&#54408;&#51008; &#50500;&#51060;&#54056;&#46300; &#48120;&#45768; 64GB/3G/WIFI&#50752; &#51452;&#44228;&#51221;&#50640;&#49436; 50.00&#46041;&#51060; &#51080;&#45716; PFC &#50976;&#49900;&#52852;&#46300;&#51064;&#45796;. &#50948; &#44221;&#54408;&#51008; &#44592;&#53440; &#54805;&#49885;&#51004;&#47196; &#51204;&#54872;&#54624; &#49688; &#50630;&#45796;. &#45817;&#52392;&#51088;&#45716; &#49689;&#48149;&#48708;&#50752; &#44368;&#53685;&#48708;&#50752; &#49464;&#44552; &#48143; &#44592;&#53440;&#48708;&#50857; &#46321;&#51012; &#48512;&#45812;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796;. &#51068;&#46321; &#45812;&#52392;&#51088;&#45716; &#47784;&#53552;&#48148;&#51060;&#53356;&#47196; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#44163;&#51012; &#50836;&#44396;&#54624; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#44163;&#44284; &#44288;&#47144; &#51080;&#45716; &#47784;&#46304; &#48708;&#50857;&#51012; &#48512;&#45812;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796;. &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#49688;&#50668;&#54624; &#49884;&#44036;&#50640; &#47784;&#48708;&#54256;&#51032; &#49884;&#49828;&#53596;&#50640;&#49436; &#44060;&#51064;&#51221;&#48372;&#47484; &#49888;&#52397;&#54664;&#45912; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172;&#47564; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#49688;&#50668;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#49688;&#50668;&#54624; &#49884;&#51216;&#50640;&#49436; &#47784;&#48708;&#54256; &#49884;&#49828;&#53596;&#50640;&#49436; &#51221;&#48372;&#47484; &#49888;&#52397;&#54664;&#45912; &#45817;&#52392;&#46112; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#49688; &#50668;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796;. &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45716; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51004;&#47084; &#44040; &#49688; &#50630;&#51012; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#44428;&#54620;&#51060; &#51080;&#45716; &#44592;&#44288;&#51060; &#54869;&#51064;&#46108; &#50948;&#51076;&#51109;&#51012; &#54588;&#50948;&#51076;&#51088;&#44032; &#45824;&#49888;&#54616;&#50668; &#48155;&#51004;&#47084; &#44032;&#46020; &#46108;&#45796; . &#50836; &#44552;&#51228; &#46321;&#47197;&#51088;&#44032; &#44060;&#51064; &#51064; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#49888;&#48516;&#51613;&#51012; &#48372;&#50668;&#51480;&#50556; &#54616;&#44256; &#46608;&#45716; &#49888;&#48516;&#51613;&#51032; &#51221;&#48372;&#45716; &#47784;&#48708;&#54256;&#51032; &#49884;&#49828;&#53596;&#50640;&#49436; &#49888;&#52397;&#54664;&#45912; &#51221;&#48372;&#50752; &#47582;&#52656;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#46321;&#47197;&#51088;&#44032; &#54924;&#49324;&#46972;&#45716; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#54924;&#49324;&#51032; &#49548;&#44060;&#49436; &#44536;&#47532;&#44256; &#54924;&#49324; &#50689;&#50629;&#54728;&#44032;&#51613; &#46608;&#45716; &#45817;&#52392;&#51088;&#45208; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51004;&#47084; &#44040; &#48516;&#51032; &#49888;&#48516;&#51613;&#51012; &#48372;&#50668;&#51480;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . &#49440;&#48520;&#54805;&#49885; &#49436;&#48708;&#49828; , &#49440;&#48520;&#51008; &#54980;&#48520;&#51004;&#47196; &#48320;&#44221;&#54632; , &#54980;&#48520;&#51008; &#49440;&#48520;&#51004;&#47196; &#48320;&#44221;&#54632; &#46321; &#49436;&#48708;&#49828;&#51060;&#50857;&#54805;&#49885;&#51012; &#48320;&#44221;&#54624; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#44228;&#49549; &#51648;&#53416;&#45796; . &#47784;&#48708;&#54256;&#54620;&#53580;&#49436; &#44228;&#50529;&#51088;&#47484; &#48320;&#44221;&#54624; &#54728;&#46973;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#44221;&#50864; &#51228;&#50808;&#54616;&#47728; &#52628;&#52392;&#48264;&#54840;&#47484; &#49892;&#54665;&#54624; &#49884;&#51216;&#48512;&#53552; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49884;&#51216;&#44620;&#51648; &#44228;&#50557;&#51088;&#47484; &#48320;&#44221;&#54616;&#47732; &#50504; &#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . b. &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#51109;&#49548; &#48143; &#49884;&#44036; : &#51068;&#46321; , &#51060;&#46321;&#44284; &#54980;&#48520;&#51228;&#47564;&#51032; &#44221;&#54408;&#51064; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640;: &#49468;&#53552;2 &#45716; &#45817;&#52392;&#51088;&#50640;&#44172; &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#51649;&#51217; &#49688;&#50668;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . &#54924;&#49324;&#51032; &#45824;&#54364;&#51088;&#45716; &#49345;&#44277;&#48512;&#51032; &#45824;&#54364;&#51088; &#48143; &#49888;&#47928;&#44592;&#44288; , &#48169;&#49569;&#44397;&#51032; &#44592;&#51088;&#46308; , &#54924;&#49324;&#51076;&#50896; , &#45817;&#52392;&#51088; &#46321; &#52280;&#49437;&#46108; &#49688;&#50668;&#49885;&#51012; &#44144;&#54665;&#54624; &#44161;&#45768;&#45796; . &#49340;&#46321; : &#47784;&#48708;&#54256; &#45824;&#47532;&#51216; / &#51648;&#51216;&#50640;&#49436; &#49688;&#50668;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . &#44221;&#54408;&#51012; &#49688;&#50668;&#54624; &#44592;&#44036; : &#51060; &#52628;&#52392;&#51060; &#45149;&#45212; &#45216;&#47196;&#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 12 &#50900; &#47568;&#50640; &#50696;&#51221;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . 6. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#44592;&#44036; : 2013 &#45380; 10 &#50900; 16 &#51068; &#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 26 &#51068; &#44620;&#51648; (MBF KV 2) &#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6048;&#6085;&#6021;&#6081;&#6025;&#6037;&#6098;&#6025;&#6078;&#6042;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6021;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035; - &#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6065;&#6016;&#6070;&#6047;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6040;&#6089;&#6076;&#6031;&#6076;&#6040;&#6016;&#6037;&#6098;&#6033;&#6087; 1. &#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; &#6047;&#6036;&#6070;&#6098;&#6026;&#6048;&#6093;&#6035;&#6084;&#6087;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6033;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6043;&#6078;&#6016;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;, &#6041;&#6016;&#6021;&#6081;&#6025;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026; &#6023;&#6070;&#6037;&#6098;&#6043;&#6076;&#6044;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6080;&#6040;&#6100; &#6033;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6073;&#6040;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6035;&#6084;&#6087;&#6034;&#6098;&#6044;&#6078;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6048;&#6081;&#6031;&#6075;&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6071;&#6043;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6024;&#6070;&#6035;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6038;&#6096;&#6031;&#6092;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6100; &#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035; MDT &#6023;&#6070;&#6037;&#6098;&#6043;&#6076;&#6044;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6036;&#6091;&#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6017;&#6017;&#6030;&#6098;&#6028;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;, &#6040;&#6023;&#6098;&#6024;&#6040;&#6030;&#6098;&#6028;&#6043;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6031;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6037;&#6098;&#6018;&#6031;&#6091;&#6037;&#6098;&#6018;&#6020;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6043;&#6086;&#6026;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6100; &#183; &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035; MDT &#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6071;&#6043;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6035;&#6085;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042; 02 &#6017;&#6070;&#6020;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6023;&#6086;&#6038;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6035;&#6085;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6071;&#6043;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6100; &#183; &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035;&#6072;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6103;&#6050;&#6070;&#6021;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6021;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6026;&#6078;&#6040;&#6098;&#6036;&#6072;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6100; &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6036;&#6078;&#6047;&#6071;&#6035;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6021;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091; &#183; &#6037;&#6098;&#6050;&#6082;&#6016;&#6033;&#6085; &#6043;&#6078;&#6043;&#6033;&#6098;&#6034;&#6037;&#6043;&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6071;&#6043;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6035;&#6083;&#6047;&#6036;&#6070;&#6098;&#6026;&#6048;&#6035;&#6072;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6103;, MobiFone &#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6034;&#6098;&#6044;&#6078;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6033;&#6020;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6026;&#6078;&#6040;&#6098;&#6036;&#6072;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6038;&#6096;&#6031;&#6092;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6030;&#6082;&#6042;&#6035;&#6070;&#6086;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6026;&#6086;&#6049;&#6078;&#6020;&#6038;&#6096;&#6031;&#6092;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6066;&#6098;&#6041;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035; &#6041;&#6089;&#6070;&#6020;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6026;&#6100; &#183; &#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6041;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6082;&#6036;&#6036;&#6033;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6038;&#6096;&#6031;&#6092;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6081;&#6021;, T T2 &#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6081;&#6021;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6072;&#6024;&#6098;&#6040;&#6084;&#6087;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;, &#6034;&#6098;&#6044;&#6078;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6047;&#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6047;&#6070;&#6017;&#6070;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6050;&#6086;&#6038;&#6072;&#6036;&#6082;&#6036;&#6036;&#6033;, &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6033;&#6072;&#6031;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6100; 5. &#6036;&#6082;&#6036;&#6036;&#6033;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6033;&#6072;&#6031;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6102; a. &#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6017;&#6017;&#6030;&#6098;&#6028;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6102; &#183; &#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6033;&#6072;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6036;&#6098;&#6026;&#6076;&#6042;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6040;&#6089;&#6070;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6035; Honda Vision ( &#6016;&#6086; &#6030;&#6082; &#6047;&#6098;&#6031;&#6020;&#6091;&#6026;&#6070;&#6042;&#6022;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6086; 2013) &#6026;&#6084;&#6041;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6075;&#6040;&#6048;&#6090;&#6075;&#6035; Honda Việt Nam &#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6047;&#6035;&#6085;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 02/10/2013 (28.700.000 đồng)&#6100; &#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6033;&#6072;&#6086;&#6038;&#6072;&#6042;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6026;&#6084;&#6041;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6032;&#6075;&#6018;&#6074;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033; Nokia Lumia 620 &#6100; &#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6033;&#6072;&#6036;&#6072;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6026;&#6084;&#6041;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6032;&#6075;&#6018;&#6074;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6016;&#6084;&#6047;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091; 500.000đ &#6100;&#6026;&#6084;&#6041;&#6049;&#6082;&#6016; &#6021;&#6086;&#6038;&#6084;&#6087;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;​ &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6066;&#6098;&#6041;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6021;&#6070;&#6086;&#6017;&#6082;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6026;&#6084;&#6041;&#6023;&#6070;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6032;&#6075;&#6018;&#6074; IPAD mini 64GB/ 3G/ Wifi &#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040; Sim PFC, &#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6023;&#6070;&#6047;&#6098;&#6042;&#6081;&#6021; 50.000đ &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072;&#6018;&#6084;&#6043;&#6100; &#183; &#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6033;&#6072;&#6036;&#6072;&#6102; &#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6042;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6070;&#6035;&#6091;&#6035;&#6085;&#6048;&#6070;&#6020;&#6034;&#6086;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091; 12/2013 6. &#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; &#6021;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 16/10/2013 &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 26/11/2013&#6100;
